scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[34m[Workout Discipline Tracker]\u001b[0m Setting up shared imports...'); try { require('fs').mkdirSync('src/utils', { recursive: true }); if(require('fs').existsSync('scripts/sharedImports.ts')) { require('fs').copyFileSync('scripts/sharedImports.ts', 'src/utils/sharedImports.ts'); console.log('\u001b[32m✓ Success:\u001b[0m Shared imports configured'); } else { console.log('\u001b[33m⚠ Warning:\u001b[0m scripts/sharedImports.ts not found, run npm run setup instead'); } } catch(e) { console.error('\u001b[31m✗ Error:\u001b[0m', e); }"
